page.title: 07MOTTRAM VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The village hall has now been in use for 36 years and the lounge and bar for l2 years. The usual village activities take place here i.e.dances, parties,wedding receptions,concerts, jumble sales. There is a thriving Village Club which meets every Tuesday evening and on Sunday. The game of Bowls is played throughout the Summer on several evenings each week. Indoor games of snooker and pool are available to club members,also darts,dominoes etc. Twice each year the local Dramatic Society present a play,and a well supported group of the Women's Institute meet each month on the lst Monday. Regular weekly classes of Yoga and Keep Fit and occasional classes such as Flower Arranging,are held here.
